title: Monte Coppolo
description: Monte Coppolo is an ancient settlement usually referred to in archaeological literature by the modern name of the mountain on which it is located in modern Italy's Basilicata region. It is perhaps the site of ancient Lagaria, referred to by Strabo as a fortress (Φρούριον).

properties.description: Coordinates as collected and published by Myers 2018. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: GPS Location of Monte Coppolo
